name: Forklift Warehouse Challenge
description:
Ever wish you could drive the forklift at your local home improvement store or company warehouse?

Pick up a pallet from a specified aisle and shelf position and deliver it to the shipping area. Pick up pallets from the receiving area and place them on the specified shelf. Six levels of play with increasing difficulty, including a freeform level where you can move things around as you choose.

Several different 3d camera views:
- 1st person — see what the driver sees.
- 3rd person — from above and behind the forklift
- fork view — look down the prongs of the fork

Simple intuitive controls: Lean your iPhone forward and back to go forward / reverse. Lean to sides to steer left / right. Press onscreen up / down arrows to raise / lower fork.

Try your hand at operating a forklift!

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, iPhone X and XS displays.
